item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurants and events in Providence.

This week's location is: Harry's Bar & Burger - on North Main Street (where Chinese Laundry "used to be" for those that remember!) ;-)  Look for the life-size cow out front!

Harry's Bar & Burger is the latest restaurant edition to North Main Street's Restaurant Row and is situated between XO Cafe and Mills Tavern.

For you Providence Burger Connaisseuers - Harry's is the latest burger joint created by the owners of Luxe and Rick's Roadhouse - so if you want to make a comparison - this should be on your list. Harry's offers burgers, but they also specialize in dogs, so no matter your craving they have something to suit. Also, there is a fine selection of craft beers and other concoctions to tantalize your taste buds, so it really has something for everyone, no matter your culinary preference.

We will have the whole second floor just for us, so what are you waiting for; let's check it out!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Meetup. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can't miss us, we'll be upstairs!!! I'll be wearing some kind of scarf
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Harry's Bar & Burger!!!
